title: Fix Cardano’s Cross-chain Swap Liquidity Crisis
summary: When it comes to cross-chain swaps, it is difficult to bridge liquidity to/from Cardano in a non-custodial way: existing solutions are centralized, lack liquidity, lack HW support or provide clumsy UX
solution: NUFI wallet will provide a decentralized cross-chain swap solution with aggregated liquidity and broad hardware wallet support, that can be used with any existing ADA, BTC, ETH, EVM or SOL wallet

sub_fields.title: Project Open Source
sub_fields.description: Will your project's output be fully open source? Open source refers to something people can modify and share because its design is publicly accessible.

sub_fields.title: Please provide details on the intellectual property (IP) status of your project outputs, including whether they will be released as open source or retained under another licence.
sub_fields.description: Please provide here more information on the open source status of your project outputs
sub_fields.answer: No; the SwapKit SDK and NEAR Intents API is open source, but NUFI wallet’s codebase is not. We (like other Cardano wallets including Eternl and Vespr) have not open-sourced our wallet’s codebase due to concerns around it being cloned and distributed with malicious code added.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Compared to existing cross-chain swap solutions, NUFI’s proposal:



- Offers thousands more trading pairs to/from Cardano (through SwapKit’s protocol and DEX aggregation, and NEAR Intents) with aggregation for fetching better rates and deep aggregated liquidity to fulfil swaps
- Is fully non-custodial and does not require KYC or signup
- Can be used with all existing Cardano/Bitcoin/Ethereum/EVM/Solana wallets (through multi-seed phrase/private key import) and 6 hardware wallets

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
**Decentralized cross\-chain swap functionality** will be accessible inside NUFI’s browser extension wallet and web wallet interface (in the ‘DEX’ section, and accessible from the Assets and Accounts screens by clicking ‘Exchange’ next to an asset).



- The MVP will demonstrate the ability to swap thousands of assets across chains, to and from ADA, in a fully non-custodial way using SwapKit and NEAR Intents integrations.
- The MVP will display routes and offer choices, display all associated swap fees, and – after swapping – allow assets to be deposited either in a user’s NUFI wallet profile, or an external wallet (for assets that NUFI wallet doesn’t support in its interface). Order history will also be accessible in NUFI's interface.



**Multi\-seed phrase/private key import functionality** will be available inside NUFI wallet’s browser extension wallet and web wallet.



- A user will be able to consolidate wallets and assets on different chains (Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum and EVM, Solana) into one single wallet interface by adding multiple seed phrases or private keys to a single wallet.



We will open up both features for testing as we progress; these will be accessible via a staging version of NUFI wallet (pre-production) and the link for this will be made available to the Cardano community in NUFI’s Discord server, on X, and – with the consent of the Catalyst team – through Catalyst channels.

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We will consider the project a success if:



- Users (without needing support) are able to swap assets to and from Cardano from popular chains (including Bitcoin, Ethereum, EVMs like BNB, Aritrum, Optimism and Polygon, and Solana) in a fully non-custodial way
- Monthly volume using the proposed swap solution reaches 10 million ADA within six months after completing the final milestone
- Users (without needing support) are able to successfully restore/consolidate multiple existing wallets (on Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum/EVM, and Solana) into one wallet interface by adding multiple seed phrases and/or private keys to one wallet profile; users' assets on different chains are easily managed and swapped from a single interface

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
# Background: Problems with exiting cross-chain swap solutions


**Lack of liquidity**

- There are almost no decentralized cross-chain swap protocols that support Cardano. Even the most popular ones have very little liquidity, and users who swap across chains to Cardano receive significantly less crypto than they spend as a result.
- **Pain point:** a lack of liquidity on protocols reduces your portfolio’s value when you swap assets across chains to Cardano.



**Lack of hardware wallet support**

- Hardware wallet users cannot easily swap assets to and from Cardano; end-to-end support for hardware wallets is hard to guarantee as it requires wallets on different chains to support the same device and, importantly, a protocol supporting these wallets.
- **Pain point**: a user’s wallets on different chains do not always support the same hardware wallets and, if they do, a protocol may not support the wallets themselves.



**Centralized options aren’t secure**

- There are many centralized exchanges that support swapping assets to and from Cardano; however, centralized exchanges require a user to create an account (which may not be possible based on a user’s location) and share personal details through KYC procedures. A centralized exchange can prevent a user from withdrawing funds from the exchange under the guise of anti-money laundering (AML) or fraud prevention.
- **Pain point**: centralized exchanges don’t give you full control over your funds and require you to share personal information (that could link your real-world identity with your crypto activities).



# NUFI’s solution:
**Non\-custodial cross\-chain swaps with aggregated liquidity, broad hardware wallet support, and multi\-chain wallet consolidation**



NUFI’s proposal has two parts:

1. integrate SwapKit/NEAR Intents into NUFI wallet to provide cross-chain swap functionality; and
2. enable multi-seed phrase/private key import so that Cardano users can restore their existing Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum/EVM, Solana and other wallets into one single wallet interface and swap assets across chains seamlessly.



# Part 1: SwapKit/NEAR Intents integration


Integrating SwapKit/NEAR Intents into NUFI’s non-custodial wallet interface will allow users to swap thousands of assets to/from ADA in an easy, non-custodial, and cost-efficient way.



**Cardano users will be able to:**



- Restore multiple existing wallets (for Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum, all EVM chains, Solana and SVM chains) into a single non-custodial wallet interface
- Swap thousands of assets to/from ADA – including BTC, ETH, SOL, BNB, USDT, USDC – with a couple of clicks (and in one transaction)
- Swap assets at the best rates: SwapKit aggregates cross-chain protocols and DEXes to find the best rates for each swap (furthermore, a user will be able to choose the swap’s route or use a fallback exchange, powered by Changelly, if liquidity is too low or a given pair is unavailable)
- Have orders fulfilled without losing value (thanks to the aggregated liquidity that SwapKit/NEAR Intents unlocks)
- Swap assets using a hardware wallet: Ledger, Trezor, Keystone, BitBox02, OneKey, and GridPlus devices supported
- Swap with no KYC or signup needed
- View swap history in NUFI’s interface
- Swap bridged assets for Cardano tokens using NUFI’s existing Cardano DEX aggregator (powered by DexHunter)



**The proposed SwapKit integration can be used with existing \(non\-NUFI\) wallets thanks to…**

# Part 2: Multi-seed phrase/private key import


This functionality allows a user to combine multiple seed phrases/private keys into a single wallet in NUFI’s interface.



**With this, a user will be able to:**



- restore their Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum, EVM, Solana and SVM wallets into a single wallet interface to make assets easily available for use with the SwapKit solution
- move liquidity from ‘my BTC wallet’ to ‘my ADA wallet’ with a couple of clicks
- into the same wallet, add hardware wallet accounts; Ledger, Trezor, Keystone, BitBox02, OneKey and GridPlus devices supported. Please see [https://nu\.fi/chains/support](https://nu.fi/chains/support) for more information



**Supported seed phrases types**: 12, 15, and 24-word BIP-39 mnemonics

**Supported private key type**: cardano-cli .skey format



**FAQs**

Q: If I restore my wallet into NUFI, does it change my existing wallet setup?

A: No; you can restore your wallet into an unlimited number of wallet interfaces and use all interfaces at the same time without changing your wallet’s setup. You’ll see the same assets/accounts in each interface.



Q: Can I remove a seed phrase or private key from my wallet after importing it?

A: Yes, you’ll be able to remove a seed phrase or private key after importing it, which will remove the associated accounts/assets from your wallet.



**About SwapKit**

SwapKit is a multi-chain swap and DeFi SDK/aggregator that lets apps and wallets perform cross-chain token swaps, bridging, and DEX trades through a single interface.



SwapKit integrates major decentralized non-custodial cross chain protocols such as ThorChain, Chainflip, Maya Protocol and NEAR Intents on 30+ major chains. It also aggregates 12 on-chain DEXes. Therefore, SwapKit is able to find a route for almost any token to any token. SwapKit does not support Cardano yet (although it is supported on NEAR Intents and should be supported on Maya Protocol later this year) but it should add Cardano support soon.



If SwapKit won’t add Cardano support in time, we will integrate Near Intents (which supports Cardano already) and add SwapKit support on top of it once available (as SwapKit support will enable advanced routing also through DEXes, including eventually a Cardano DEX).

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
**SwapKit/NEAR Intents integration:**

- Will open up deep-liquidity routes for users who want to move funds in and out of Cardano; Cardano users will benefit from being able to swap to ADA from other chains without suffering significant loss due to low liquidity
- Will enable Cardano users to trade thousands of assets on other chains for ADA in a single interface (i.e. without needing to use multiple protocols with multiple wallets, and without needing to pay multiple transaction fees); hardware wallet users will also benefit from the extensive HW support that this solution offers



**Multi\-seed phrase/private key import:**

- Will enable users to consolidate wallets on multiple chains into one single wallet interface so that assets can be swapped across chains seamlessly

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
The NUFI wallet team is best-placed in Cardano to deliver such a project; the team has vast experience of multi-chain wallet architecture, including cross-chain swaps. Alongside creating a multi-chain wallet that supports Cardano and hundreds more blockchains, we successfully integrated a semi-custodial cross-chain Exchange (powered by Changelly) and we fully understand the intricacies of integrating this type of solution.



Alongside this, our reliability is proven by our strong track record of building in Cardano, which includes developing AdaLite.io (Cardano’s first browser-based wallet in 2018), the Cardano firmware and apps for both Ledger and Trezor hardware wallets, Cardano compatibility for MetaMask wallet (aka Cardano Wallet Snap), and Cardano’s first SSO solution (the last two of which were funded by Project Catalyst voters in Fund11 and completed within budget, on time, and in full).

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Milestone 1 - Integrate Swapkit's swapping functionality

- For research, implementation, testing, project management: 39 dev days at a day rate of 1463 ADA, for a total of 57,073 ADA



Milestone 2 - Integrate SwapKit order history

- For research, implementation, testing, project management: 10 dev days at a day rate of 1463 ADA, for a total of 14,634 ADA



Milestone 3 - Integrate SwapKit into NUFI's production environment

- For research, implementation, testing, project management: 30 dev days at a day rate of 1463 ADA, for a total of 43,902 ADA



Milestone 4 - Enable multi-seed phrase/private key import + Marketing campaign

- For research, implementation, testing, project management: 31 dev days at a day rate of 1463 ADA, for a total of 45,366 ADA
- For support and marketing: 10 support/marketing staff days at a day rate of 780 ADA, for a total of 7805 ADA



Milestone 5 - Final/Closeout

no cost

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
The proposal is value for money for Cardano’s community because:

- It encourages users to bring liquidity into Cardano’s ecosystem: at present, the low liquidity (and resulting loss of value) and poor UX of existing cross-chain swap solutions deter users from swapping to ADA from other chains
- It is significantly cheaper than boosting liquidity on existing solutions, or overhauling their UX to make them viable solutions, and significantly less than a cross-chain DEX would require for integrating Cardano support

sub_fields.title: I Agree
sub_fields.description: I confirm that I have read, understand and shall adhere to the [Project Catalyst Platform Terms of Use](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-terms-of-use), [Project Catalyst Platform Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-privacy-policy), [Terms & Conditions](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions), [Fund Rules](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/fund-rules), [Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/catalyst-fc-privacy-policy). I understand that providing accurate and truthful information is essential for my proposal to remain eligible to participate in the current Fund.
